item.title: European Leaders Discuss Financing Ukraine With Frozen Russian Assets

item.title: Australia Mourns the Youngest Victim of the Bondi Beach Shooting
item.description: Sydney’s devastated Jewish community gathered for the funeral of “Matilda Bee,” an ebullient, smiling 10-year-old girl.

item.title: Youngest Victim of Bondi Beach Shooting Laid to Rest
item.description: A funeral was held on Thursday for Matilda, 10, the youngest victim of Sunday’s mass shooting at Bondi Beach.
